name: Terrace Train
description:
Terrace Train is an interactive story  game that relies on altruism and resourcefulness. The residents are unable to leave their rooms, so they’re relying on your help. They'll  be so grateful if you go that extra mile for them.

Using your cursor, point and click on the neighbour you wish to interact with. If you’d like to give them a gift, you can simply click and drag. If you’re not sure what to tackle next, have a look at your To- Do list. 

 Like carriages on a train, or rooms in an apartment, we can feel disjointed at times. Helping one another can help us regain closeness and reminds us that we are an entire vehicle on the same journey, and we have whole neighbourhoods within our buildings.
